query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Quel color che viltà di fuor mi pinse 2 veggendo il duca mio tornare in volta, 3 più tosto dentro il suo novo ristrinse.
query.error: **English:** 1 That color which fear painted on my face 2 seeing my guide turn back, 3 he restrained more quickly within his new color.
query.result: 1 Warna yang dilukis oleh rasa takut di wajahku 2 melihat pemanduku berbalik, 3 ia tahan lebih cepat di dalam warna barunya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 Attento si fermò com’ uom ch’ascolta; 5 ché l’occhio nol potea menare a lunga 6 per l’aere nero e per la nebbia folta.
query.error: **English:** 4 He stopped attentively like a man listening, 5 because his eyes could not see far 6 through the dark air and the thick fog.
query.result: 4 Dia berhenti dengan penuh perhatian seperti seorang lelaki yang sedang mendengar, 5 karena matanya tidak dapat melihat jauh 6 melalui udara yang gelap dan kabut yang tebal.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 «Pur a noi converrà vincer la punga», 8 cominciò el, «se non . . . Tal ne s’offerse. 9 Oh quanto tarda a me ch’altri qui giunga!».
query.error: **English:** 7 "We must still conquer the summit," 8 he began, "if not . . . He offered himself in this way. 9 Oh, how long it seems to me before someone else arrives here!"
query.result: 7 "Kita masih harus menaklukkan puncaknya," 8 dimulainya, "jika tidak . . . Demikianlah ia menawarkan dirinya. 9 Oh, betapa lamanya bagiku sebelum orang lain tiba di sini!"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 I’ vidi ben sì com’ ei ricoperse 11 lo cominciar con l’altro che poi venne, 12 che fur parole a le prime diverse;
query.error: **English:** 10 I saw very well how he covered up 11 the beginning with the other that came after, 12 which were words different from the first;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 ma nondimen paura il suo dir dienne, 14 perch’ io traeva la parola tronca 15 forse a peggior sentenzia che non tenne.
query.error: **English:** 13 but nevertheless his speech caused me fear, 14 because I drew from the truncated words 15 perhaps a worse meaning than he intended.
query.result: 13 tetapi meskipun demikian ucapannya membuatku takut, 14 karena aku menarik dari kata-kata yang terpotong 15 mungkin makna yang lebih buruk daripada yang dimaksudkannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 «In questo fondo de la trista conca 17 discende mai alcun del primo grado, 18 che sol per pena ha la speranza cionca?».
query.error: **English:** 16 "Into this depth of the sad abyss 17 does anyone ever descend from the first circle, 18 who has only lost hope as punishment?".
query.result: 16 "Ke dalam jurang kesedihan yang dalam ini 17 apakah ada yang pernah turun dari lingkaran pertama, 18 yang hanya kehilangan harapan sebagai hukuman?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Questa question fec’ io; e quei «Di rado 20 incontra», mi rispuose, «che di noi 21 faccia il cammino alcun per qual io vado.
query.error: **English:** 19 This question I asked; and he replied to me, "Rarely 20 does anyone make the journey that I am making, 21 of those who enter here."
query.result: 19 Pertanyaan ini kutanyakan; dan dia menjawabku, "Jarang 20 ada yang melakukan perjalanan yang kulakukan ini, 21 dari mereka yang masuk ke sini."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Ver è ch’altra fïata qua giù fui, 23 congiurato da quella Eritón cruda 24 che richiamava l’ombre a’ corpi sui.
query.error: **English:** 22 It is true that I was here below another time, 23 conjured by that cruel Erichtho 24 who called the shades back to their bodies.
query.result: 22 Benar bahwa aku pernah berada di sini di bawah sekali lagi, 23 disihir oleh Erichtho yang kejam itu 24 yang memanggil roh-roh kembali ke tubuh mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Di poco era di me la carne nuda, 26 ch’ella mi fece intrar dentr’ a quel muro, 27 per trarne un spirto del cerchio di Giuda.
query.error: **English:** 25 My flesh was almost naked, 26 for it made me enter within that wall, 27 to drag out a spirit from the circle of Judas.
query.result: 25 Hampir telanjanglah dagingku, 26 karena ia membuatku masuk ke dalam tembok itu, 27 untuk menyeret keluar roh dari lingkaran Yudas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Quell’ è ’l più basso loco e ’l più oscuro, 29 e ’l più lontan dal ciel che tutto gira: 30 ben so ’l cammin; però ti fa sicuro.
query.error: **English:** 28 That is the lowest and darkest place, 29 and the farthest from the heavens that turn everything: 30 I know the way well; therefore, be assured.
query.result: 28 Itulah tempat yang paling rendah dan paling gelap, 29 dan yang paling jauh dari langit yang memutar segalanya: 30 aku tahu jalannya dengan baik; oleh karena itu, yakinlah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 31 This marsh, which exhales the great stench, 32 encircles the woeful city, 33 where we can no longer enter without wrath.
query.result: 31 Payau ini yang menghembuskan bau busuk yang hebat, 32 mengelilingi kota yang menyedihkan, 33 yang tidak dapat kita masuki lagi tanpa amarah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 58 Demikianlah kata sang guru; dan dia sendiri 59 membalikkan aku, dan tidak menahan diri dari tanganku, 60 sehingga dengan tangannya sendiri dia tidak akan menutupku lagi.
